text: aur yaad karo jis din ve log jinhonne inakaar kiya, aag ke saamane pesh kie jaenge. (kaha jaega), "tum apane saansaarik jeevan mein achchhee ruchikar cheeze nasht kar baithe aur unaka maza le chuke. atah aaj tumhe apamaanajanak yaatana dee jaegee, kyonki tum dharatee mein bina kisee haq ke ghamand karate rahe aur isalie ki tum aagya ka ullanghan karate rahe.
